Summary: starlike,green,red,yellow,white,orange blinking lights. Sighted three in triangular formation, stationary. Lights would get very bright and blink then dim and get bright again. I have been watching for about 1hr and 30 min. and the objects have not moved
divs: Sighting DetailsI heard a UFO sighting on the police scanner so i went outside to see if i could see anything. I grabbed my binoculars and saw a star like object very high and far away but over where we had a bad fire a few days ago. The object was blinking red, green yellow, white and orange lights and never moved from where i first saw it. Then about 20 min later i saw another object to the left of the first sighting that also did the same thing and then another one appeared. They were in a triangular formation. All of this was east of Greenville, Texas. I have been watching for about an hour and 45 min and they are still in the same place and have not moved. I have never seen anything like this in my life.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Royse City
There was one other sighting in Royse City on or around September 11th 2011
